text: The Magnavox Odyssey is a video game console by Magnavox. It is the first one to be released commercially. But there are more consoles released by Magnavox. All these consoles form the Magnavox Odyssey series. == Consoles == The following is a list of all consoles released in the Magnavox Odyssey series: * Magnavox Odyssey (1972) * Magnavox Odyssey 100 (1975) * Magnavox Odyssey 200 (1975) * Magnavox Odyssey 300 (1976) * Magnavox Odyssey 400 (1976) * Magnavox Odyssey 500 (1976) * Magnavox Odyssey 2000 (1977) * Magnavox Odyssey 3000 (1977) * Magnavox Odyssey 4000 (1977) * Magnavox Odyssey 5000 (planned, not released) * Magnavox Odyssey 2 (1978) == Successor == In 1974, Magnavox became a subsidiary of Philips. Philips continued making video game consoles. These consoles are known as the Philips Odyssey series. Category:Video game consoles
title: Magnavox Odyssey Series
